tier.tier-desc: A small structure with a hut and a covered overhang, possibly suitable for trade.
A medium-sized house with a short wall surrounding a front courtyard.
A large two-story house with a small tower connected by a bridge.
A mid-sized structure with a podium and bleachers suitable for small guild meetings
A small structure with a hut and a covered overhang, possibly suitable for trade.
A medium-sized shop with hoppers outside, suited for sales or training. Includes consignment vendor and pawn broker.
